dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3146048A] Serious Copyright Breach
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 19, 2007 12:48 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3146048A] Serious Copyright Breach

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Serious Copyright Breach
Added by system at Monday, Feb 19 2007 06:41 pm 
X-MailFrom: mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Mon Feb 19 18:39:55 2007 
Received: (qmail 23115 invoked by alias); 20 Feb 2007 00:39:55 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 23109 invoked from network); 20 Feb 2007 00:39:55 -0000

Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 20 Feb 2007 00:39:55 -0000

Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Mon, 19 Feb 2007 18:39:54 -0600 
Return-path: <mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com> 
Delivery-date: Mon, 19 Feb 2007 18:39:54 -0600 
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) 
 by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com) 
 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
        id 1HJJ2v-0002IX-Rd 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 19 Feb 2007 18:39:53 -0600 
Received: from blaster.systems.pipex.net ([62.241.163.7]) 
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com) 
        with esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1HJJ2h-000ClB-HZ 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 19 Feb 2007 18:39:39 -0600 
Received: from shuttle (userdh093.dsl.pipex.com [62.190.231.93]) 
        by blaster.systems.pipex.net (Postfix) with SMTP id
73A66E000828; 
        Tue, 20 Feb 2007 00:39:34 +0000 (GMT) 
Reply-To: <mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com> 
From: "Lottery-Syndicate-World" <mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com> 
To: <albert@avcbi-businesscenter.com>, <albert.vancutsem@telenet.be> 
Cc: "VWD Admin" <admin@vwdmail.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com> 
Subject: Serious Copyright Breach 
Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2007 00:39:35 -0000 
Message-ID:
<HKEELCHEAGPHPJNGKOAJGECDKIAA.mail@lottery-syndicate-world.com> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="iso-8859-1" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-Priority: 1 (Highest) 
X-MSMail-Priority: High 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook IMO, Build 9.0.6604 (9.0.2911.0) 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
Importance: High 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Feb 2007 00:39:54.0099 (UTC)
FILETIME=[A3560430:01C75487] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Albert, 
 
It has been brought to my attention that you have copied my entire
website 
and reproduced the content on your own site without permission, also 
claiming full copyright of "avcbi-businesscenter". 
 
The pages in breach of my copyright are to be found here: 
http://www.avcbi-businesscenter.com/vwd/ 
http://www.avcbi-businesscenter.com/vwd/lotteryscam.html 
http://www.avcbi-businesscenter.com/vwd/bestnationalsyndicate.html 
http://www.avcbi-businesscenter.com/vwd/euromillions.html 
http://www.avcbi-businesscenter.com/vwd/guest/ 
and the dozens of pages linked from these pages... 
 
All content has been taken from my site here:- 
http://www.lottery-syndicate-world.com 
 
This content is my copyright. Your use is therefore in breach of
copyright 
law and I therefore request that you remove all identified offending
pages 
and any other places where my material has been used. I would also 
appreciate if you could confirm promptly that this has been done. 
 
Thank you, 
 
Martin Waterhouse 
http://www.lottery-syndicate-world.com
